content.question: Which of the following was a major environmental effect of the European establishment of plantation agriculture in the Americas during the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries?

choices.label: Global warming, caused by the burning of large areas of forest
Widespread deforestation and depletion of soil nutrients
Depletion of groundwater supplies caused by excessive irrigation in agricultural areas
Increases in the populations of major indigenous animal species

content.answer: Widespread deforestation and depletion of soil nutrients
